code: var sendData=function sendData(data,path){var method=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:"post";return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){var API="http://localhost:8080/api";var request=new XMLHttpRequest();request.onload=function(event){resolve(event);};request.onerror=function(error){reject(error);};request.open(method,API+path);request.send(JSON.stringify(data));});};var getData=function getData(path){return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){var API="http://localhost:8080/api";var request=new XMLHttpRequest();request.onload=function(data){resolve(data);};request.onerror=function(error){reject(error);};request.open("get",API+path);request.send();});};export{sendData,getData};
